alert.note: Alert for Koochiching (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued May 18 at 2:16PM CDT until May 19 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WATCH FOR THE POTENTIAL FAILURE AT THE NETT LAKE DAM ALONG THE NETT RIVER THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash Flooding caused by a potential dam or levee failure is possible downstream of the Nett Dam along the Nett River. * WHERE...Portions of northern Koochiching County including the Bois Forte Reservation * WHEN...Through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Dam failure may result in flash flooding of low-lying areas below the dam. The bridge along Woodchuck Road may be inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - The Nett River Dam along the Nett River is currently being over topped. Tribal authorities are monitoring the situation and a dam break is possible but not imminent at this time. If a dam failure were to occur, only minor rises are expected further downstream along the Little Fork River.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
